title: Shiny Logos Megapack FM14 Football Manager 2014
description:
-UNZIP / UNRAR

-Copy the folders containing the logos to the following path : Documents / Sports Interactive / Football Manager 2014/graphics/logos (create the folders "graphics" and "logos" if required).


-In the game, go to preferences and then in the Interface section


-In the Theme section, uncheck the "Use cache to reduce the loading time of a page" and select "Reload theme after confirmation of changes in consumer preferences"


-Confirm the changes. The logos appear.



=====================================================


LOGOS FOR EVERY COMPETITION, CLUBS, NATIONS, ETC...

FEEL THE REAL FOOTBALL WITH THIS AWESOME SELECTION OF IMAGES, not available in one easy download.... untill now.
